title: Would anyone b interested in bidding for some items on ebay?
content:
i'm going to try & get rid of some items on ebay, so far they are

Star Trek: Starfleet Command 2 Empires At War (Secondhand)
Star Trek: Enterprise Soundtrack (Opened but rarely used)
Doom 2 (Secondhand) Dos Version

is anybody interested?

the auctions i start will only be available to aussie sorry it has to be that way so that i won't have to pay international postage fees

i haven't got the seller account ready yet (still waiting for the letter containing the confirmation code) but as soon the account is ready & i have started the auctions i will post the links

btw: look for auctions under the username rorie1983 aka (Rorie Meade) that is who you will be buying from[url=http://www.dosvault.tk][img]http://venus.walagata.com/w/thedosvault/sig/tdv_banner.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://s4.invisionfree.com/The_Dos_Vault_Forum]The Dos Vault Forum needs members[/url]

title: Re: Would anyone b interested in bidding for some items on e
content:
my seller account is setup & ready, after waiting several weeks for the code which was surpossed to be sent by mail, i checked my email where someone nice from ebay gave me the code by email

i will start the auctions soon & post the links, remember only australians will be able to bid on these items[url=http://www.dosvault.tk][img]http://venus.walagata.com/w/thedosvault/sig/tdv_banner.jpg[/img][/url]
